"Insufficient Data?!":
"The professor is still entirely focused on her
dragorii research. But the past few days,
she's been grumbling about not having enough
data. So before she comes up with some
crazy idea again, I was thinking about
going out and gathering some data myself.
Could I interest you in joining me?

*Go with Wright only and complete the mission
with an S Rank on Hard difficulty or above."

"先生は相変わらず龍族の研究に没頭して
いらっしゃいます。でもここ数日、
データが足りないとぼやいていまして……
先生がまた無茶を言い出す前に
ここはひとつ、僕がデータを集めておこう
と思うんです。
同行、お願いできますでしょうか？

※ライトのみ同行、ハード以上Ｓランククリア"
